TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {103475=All the music from tonight’s show was taken from the PDX Pop Now! compilations. The first one was released in 2004. The newest one was released this past week and is available at stores such as Everyday Music and Music Millenium. If you are seeking greater knowledge of the local music scene, these comps are a great way to take it in. Festival (at Rotture) ____________________________________________________________ some stats (songs played by year): 2004: 7 2005: 3 2006: 6 2007: 6 2008: 6 2009: 6 2010: 12, 106989=The I’s – Soul’s Corruption – Herbivore Blues (Shut Up And Scream, 2009) The Shaky Hands – The Sleepless – PDX Pop Now! 2006 New Bloods – Oh, Deadly Nightshade – PDX Pop Now! 2008, 106387=HOUR THREE: Explode Into Colors – Paper (Hot Sax Version) – PDX Pop Now! 2009 Jonnyx & The Groadies – The Upheaval On Titan – PDX Pop Now! 2010 Viva Voce – Alive With Pleasure – PDX Pop Now! 2005 Tara Jane O’Neil – Famous Yellow Belly – PDX Pop Now! 2004 Alela Diane – Up North – PDX Pop Now! 2007 A Weather – Spiders, Snakes – PDX Pop Now! 2008, 105260=Sweater! – Mediterranean – PDX Pop Now! 2007, 105724=Andy Combs & The Moth – Let’s Ride – PDX Pop Now! 2008 Shicky Gnarowitz & The Transparent Wings Of Joy – Freilechs Von Der Chuppe – PDX Pop Now! 2005 ioa – Boxcar Children – PDX Pop Now! 2010 Ocean Age – Dalvik Tide – PDX Pop Now! 2010 Laura Veirs – Wide-Eyed, Legless – PDX Pop Now! 2010, 104625=Menomena – Five Little Rooms – PDX Pop Now! 2010 Talkdemonic – Mutiny Sunshine – PDX Pop Now! 2004 Mirah – Generosity – PDX Pop Now! 2009 Pink Martini – Hey Eugene – PDX Pop Now! 2008 Laura Gibson – Hands In Pockets – PDX Pop Now! 2006, 106068=The Planet The – Toledo Vader – PDX Pop Now! 2004 Nucular Animals – Oooh Kill Oooh – PDX Pop Now! 2010 March Fourth Marching Band – Space Hole – PDX Pop Now! 2006 Breakfast Mountain – Tramm – PDX Pop Now! 2010, 107204=Grouper – Rising Height – PDX Pop Now! 2009, 119398=Latest newsletter: May 2015, 51023=Well, Suprise, Suprise! Here I am again filling in for Matt Smith's Rolling Thunder Review!! Today (June 5th) is his Daughter Kelly's 9th Birthday! Happy Birthday Kelly! We began the festivities with some material from the 2-26-90 show from Oakland Coliseum Arena. A hilarious "We Want Phil" episode with Mr. Lesh delivering the goods with Tom Thumb Blues, followed by Music Never Stopped > Don't Ease Me In. We continued this very special day by fulfilling a promise made on my last show to complete the 7-18-76 Orpheum Theater show Set 2. We heard Sugar Magnolia, and the encore Johnny B. Good. It should be noted that J.B.Goode is omited from many of the F.M. broadcasts in circulation these days, so that makes the encore a rarity! At this point we began a nice set 2 sbd from Grateful Dead's East Coast hangout, Madison Square Garden on 9-9-91. By this time we were joined by my Friend, and Cohort Tom Chiles. Always a pleasure to have Tom in the room! We started set two, and made it all the way to Drums > Space before running out of time. We then turned the chair over to Rasheed. Matt will be in the chair on June 26th in place of me, and Alicia Olson and I will be anchoring the Portland Waterfront Blues Festival on July 4th one week later. Commander Cody will be headlining that day before the fireworks! We'll see you on the fourth!, 104908=Nice Boys – Johnny Guitar – PDX Pop Now! 2007 Mean Jeans – Steve Don’t Party No More – PDX Pop Now! 2010 The Thermals – Product Placement – PDX Pop Now! 2006 Cootie Platoon – Divided – PDX Pop Now! 2006 Junkface – ATAMAKATAHIZAASHI – PDX Pop Now! 2007 Kristin Hersh – Blackstone – PDX Pop Now! 2007, 106319=The Minders – I’m So Low – PDX Pop Now! 2005, 104284=HOUR ONE: Lightheaded – Hard Rock – PDX Pop Now! 2009}
